member.name: T:Ekip.Framework.Entities.Validation.ValidationRuleHandler
member.summary: Delegate providing the signature of all methods that will process validation rules.

remarks.para: The method handler should set the Description attribute of the parameter so that a meaningful error is returned.
If the data is valid, the method must return true. If the data is invalid, the Description should be set the false should be returned.
